EmailTemplate.subject: 40% OFF Avery Ultra Tabs.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> FREE Shipping* <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse?Ntt=avery+%22ultratabs%22&Ntk=All&soffer=false&?cmp=EBBSAUGUSTCAMPAIGN20191EN&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> 40% OFF Avery UltraTabs
Enter Promo Code At Checkout 19AVE40
Offer expires September 15, 2019 Shop All <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse?Ntt=avery+%22ultratabs%22&Ntk=All&soffer=false&?cmp=EBBSAUGUSTCAMPAIGN20191EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Keeping tabs on your life!
• UltraTabs make indexing, flagging and referencing quick and easy. • Ultra-versatile and great for organizing documents, files, notebooks and more. • Ultra-removable - they stick securely yet remove easily. • Perfect for home, office and school. Mini Tabs Show Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse?Ntt=avery+ultratabs+mini+tabs&Ntk=All&soffer=false?cmp=EBBSAUGUSTCAMPAIGN20191EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Big Tabs Show Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse?Ntt=avery+ultratabs+repositionable+big+tabs&Ntk=All&soffer=false?cmp=EBBSAUGUSTCAMPAIGN20191EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Multi Use Tabs Show Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse?Ntt=avery+ultratabs+multi-use&Ntk=All&soffer=false?cmp=EBBSAUGUSTCAMPAIGN20191EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse?Ntt=avery+%22ultratabs%22&Ntk=All&soffer=false&?cmp=EBBSAUGUSTCAMPAIGN20191EN&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT17EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
